snippet: Shannon Eastin will become the first woman to officiate an N.F.L. game when the San Diego Chargers host the Green Bay Packers on Thursday night.
abstract: Shannon Eastin will become the first woman to officiate an N.F.L. game when the San Diego Chargers host the Green Bay Packers on Thursday night.

headline.main: Woman Prepares to Officiate and Make N.F.L. History
